description: Non-REM RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation  [(Total number of apneas and hypopneas in non-REM sleep associated with >= 5% oxygen desaturation) / (hours of NREM sleep)]
calculation: 60 * ( hnrbp5 + hnrop5 + canbp5 + canop5 + oanbp5 + oanop5 ) / ( slpprdp - minremp )

hybrid.LABEL: Calculated - Overall Non-rem RDI at 5% oxygen desaturation
